death_claim_payment.title: Following are the documents required for death claim payment.
death_claim_payment.subtitle: Required documents for death claim payment

data.subtitle: ● Intimation letter from the nominee or the claimant of the policy holder (Note: the intimation should include date / time / place and cause of death.)
● Copy of citizenship or passport of claimant
● Postmortem report or police report with accident site and dead body position. (if the death is accidental)
● Documents of medical treatment (if death is in course of treatment)
● Other documents asked by company if additional information is required.

policy_issue.title: Following documents are required for issuing a new policy.
policy_issue.subtitle: Required documents for Policy Issue

data.subtitle: ● Receipt of amount paid for Medical Examination
● Copy of Citizenship Certificate and/or Birth Registration Certificate

maturity_claim_payment.title: Following are the documents required for maturity claim payment.
maturity_claim_payment.subtitle: Required documents for maturity claim payment

agent_qualifications.title: To become an agent, you require the following documents and formal training of 3 days provided by Himalayan Life.
agent_qualifications.subtitle: Requirements to be an Agent

data.subtitle: ● Copy of at least SEE/SLC pass Mark Sheet
● Copy of at least SEE/SLC pass Character Certificate
● Formal Training of 3 days provided by Himalayan Life
● Passport size color photo (both ears must be visible, photo on police and army dress won't be accepted)
● Fee as per the Nepal Insurance Authority
